thread.title: Police appeal after suspected 'abduction attempt'
thread.title_full: Police appeal after suspected 'abduction attempt' | West Country - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Police appeal after suspected 'abduction attempt'
text:
Credit: PA Gloucestershire Police are appealing for witnesses following a report of a suspicious incident involving a child in Newent.
A girl, 12, was cycling on Aston Ingham Road, Kilcot when a white Ford car with three people inside, a man and woman in the front and another man in the back, pulled up alongside her.
The male driver opened the door and said to the girl to get in the car. A young male got out of the back of the car and tried to grab her, however he did not touch her and the girl quickly cycled home.
The driver of the car is described as around 45 years of age, of muscular build and balding. The younger male, possibly a teenager, was wearing a grey zip up hoody with the hood up. The woman in the front passenger seat had long hair.
Police would like to hear from anyone in the area at the time who saw a white Ford car and its occupants or who has any information that can help police with their enquires.
Last updated Tue 14 Feb 2017 Newent Gloucestershire
